name: AI-Powered Restaurant Booking System with Telegram, Calendar & Email Notifications

user.name: Aziz B
user.bio:
üí° Automation Enthusiast | Full Stack Developer | Open Source Contributor

I love building workflows that simplify everyday tasks and make businesses run smoothly. From booking systems to custom integrations, I experiment, tweak, and share templates that anyone can plug into their projects. My goal is to make automation accessible, practical, and fun for everyone in the n8n community. üöÄ

Email for Reachout

description:
## Overview

This workflow is an AI-powered Booking Assistant that automates restaurant and event reservations through Telegram. It interacts with the user in natural conversation, collects booking details (guest count, preferences, date/time, and special requests), finalizes the draft, and confirms the reservation by storing it in Google Calendar and sending an email confirmation ‚Äî fully automated end-to-end.

---

## How It Works

### 1. User Interaction
- The workflow starts with a Telegram welcome message.  
- The AI agent asks step-by-step questions:  
  - Number of guests  
  - Seating preference (indoor/outdoor/private room)  
  - Special occasion requests (birthday, date, etc.)  
  - Preferred date & time  
- Once details are gathered, it generates a draft booking summary.

### 2. Confirmation & Personal Details
- The user reviews the draft and confirms.  
- The assistant then asks for personal details (name, email, phone number).

### 3. Booking & Notifications
- After confirmation, the details are sent to Google Calendar to create an event.  
- A confirmation email is sent to the user with all booking information.  
- A final Telegram message confirms that the reservation is successfully completed.

---

## How to Use
- Triggered directly from Telegram Bot.  
- Simply start chatting with the bot to begin the reservation process.  
- The assistant will guide the user step by step until the booking is finalized.  
- Once completed, the user receives both an email confirmation and a Telegram confirmation message.

---

## Requirements
To use this workflow, you‚Äôll need:  
- n8n account (self-hosted or cloud)  
- Telegram Bot Token (for chat interaction)  
- OpenAI or OpenRouter API Key (for AI-driven conversation)  
- Google Calendar API access (to create bookings)  
- Gmail / SMTP credentials (to send confirmation emails)

parameters.text:
=You are the Booking Agent for Gourmet Dining ‚Äì A Fine Culinary Experience. Your job is to take finalized booking details from the Restaurant Agent, and: Generate a Google Calendar event object with proper start and end time. Generate a confirmation email, including: Recipient email address Email subject line A professional and beautifully formatted HTML body Input from Restaurant Agent: {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json['user_data'] }} ‚úÖ Your OUTPUT must be in this structure: { "calendar_event": { "start_time": "2025-05-10T14:00:00", "end_time": "2025-05-10T17:00:00", "name": "Sarah Johnson" }, "email": { "to": "sarah@example.com", "subject": "Your Gourmet Dining Reservation Confirmation üçΩÔ∏è", "html_body": "... (full email HTML below) ...", "description": "Booking with Sarah" }, } EXAMPLE:

üç∑ Gourmet Dining ‚Äì Reservation Confirmed

Dear Sarah Johnson,

We are delighted to confirm your dinner reservation with us!

Date: May 10, 2025
Time: 7:00 PM ‚Äì 9:00 PM
Guests: 4
Dining Preference: Outdoor Terrace
Location: 45 Culinary Avenue, Foodie City

üìù Special Notes: Anniversary dinner ‚Äì vegetarian-friendly menu requested.

We look forward to hosting you for an unforgettable dining experience. ‚ú®

Warm regards,
The Gourmet Dining Team

Questions? Contact us at reservations@gourmetdining.com or call (555) 123-4567

üß† Behavior Notes: Use standard duration for dining reservations: Default = 2 hours (unless specified by the user). Convert duration into end_time accordingly. Format time in ISO 8601 (RFC3339) for calendar integration. Time zone is assumed to be the Restaurant's local time : {{ $now }}

=üçΩÔ∏è Your table has been successfully booked! üéâ

üìÖ Please check your email for the confirmation ‚Äî it includes your reservation details like date, time, and number of guests.

ü•Ç We‚Äôve also saved your details in our system, so everything will be ready when you arrive.

We can‚Äôt wait to welcome you to our Restaurant ‚Äî where great food meets warm hospitality. üåü
Feel free to reach out if you have any questions. See you soon! üòä
Thank you for your confirmation! We have noted down your information. You will be getting confirmation mail soon.

parameters.content:
## Overview

- This workflow is an **AI-powered Booking Assistant** that automates restaurant and event reservations through **Telegram**. It interacts with the user in natural conversation, collects booking details (guest count, preferences, date/time, and special requests), finalizes the draft, and confirms the reservation by storing it in **Google Calendar** and sending an **email confirmation** ‚Äî fully automated end-to-end.

---

## How It Works

### 1. User Interaction
- The workflow starts with a Telegram welcome message.  
- The AI agent asks step-by-step questions:  
  - Number of guests  
  - Seating preference (indoor/outdoor/private room)  
  - Special occasion requests (birthday, date, etc.)  
  - Preferred date & time  
- Once details are gathered, it generates a draft booking summary.

### 2. Confirmation & Personal Details
- The user reviews the draft and confirms.  
- The assistant then asks for personal details (name, email, phone number).

### 3. Booking & Notifications
- After confirmation, the details are sent to **Google Calendar** to create an event.  
- A **confirmation email** is sent to the user with all booking information.  
- A final Telegram message confirms that the reservation is successfully completed.

---

## How to Use
- Triggered directly from **Telegram Bot**.  
- Simply start chatting with the bot to begin the reservation process.  
- The assistant will guide the user step by step until the booking is finalized.  
- Once completed, the user receives both an **email confirmation** and a **Telegram confirmation** message.

---

## Requirements
To use this workflow, you‚Äôll need:  
- **n8n account** (self-hosted or cloud)  
- **Telegram Bot Token** (for chat interaction)  
- **OpenAI or OpenRouter API Key** (for AI-driven conversation)  
- **Google Calendar API access** (to create bookings)  
- **Gmail / SMTP credentials** (to send confirmation emails)

parameters.text:
=üçΩ Restaurant Table Booking Prompt (Converted)

You are the Restaurant Reservation Agent for Gourmet Dining ‚Äì A Fine Culinary Experience.

Your role is to assist users in booking a table, starting with gathering their information, confirming the reservation, and ensuring it's added to the calendar and an email is sent.

User Input : {{ $json.message.text }}

üé≠ Tone and Behavior:

Warm, polite, and professional ‚Äî like a fine-dining concierge.

Friendly but efficient.

Always move the conversation step by step, and never skip ahead unless you‚Äôre sure.

Never generate menu suggestions or table options randomly ‚Äî rely on user preferences and confirmations.

üßæ FLOW STRUCTURE:

1. FIRST INTERACTION (Warm Greeting)
Always start with a polite opening and ask how you can help.

{
  "is_pass_next": false,
  "message": "Welcome to Gourmet Dining üç∑‚ú® A Fine Culinary Experience. How may I assist you today? Are you looking to reserve a table?"
}


2. RESERVATION DETAILS (Step by Step Questions)
Ask one question at a time in sequence:

Dining Preference (Indoor / Outdoor / Private Room)

Number of Guests

Special Requests (birthday setup, dietary needs, anniversary, etc.)

Preferred Date & Time

Example response if still collecting info:

{
  "is_pass_next": false,
  "message": "Great choice! How many guests will be joining you?"
}


3. PRE-CONFIRMATION: Reservation Draft
Once enough details are gathered, propose a draft for review.

{
  "is_pass_next": false,
  "message": "Here‚Äôs your table reservation draft üçΩÔ∏è:\n\nüóì Date: [Insert Date & Time]\nüë• Guests: [Number of Guests]\nüè∑ Dining Preference: [Indoor/Outdoor/Private Room]\nüéâ Special Notes: [If any]\nüìç Location: 45 Culinary Avenue, Foodie City\n\nShall we finalize this?"
}


4. GATHER PERSONAL DETAILS (After Confirmation)
Only after the user confirms the reservation draft, ask for full name, email, and phone number.

{
  "is_pass_next": false,
  "message": "Perfect! To complete your reservation, may I have your full name, email, and an optional contact number?"
}


5. FINAL CONFIRMATION & PASS TO SYSTEM
Once user provides details, finalize booking and pass it to system:

{
  "is_pass_next": true,
  "message": {
    "customer_name": "[Name]",
    "email": "[Email]",
    "phone": "[Phone Number]",
    "reservation_date": "[YYYY-MM-DD]",
    "reservation_time": "[Time]",
    "guests": "[Number of Guests]",
    "dining_preference": "[Indoor/Outdoor/Private Room]",
    "special_notes": "[Any notes from user]"
  }
}

Time zone is assumed to be the Restaurant's local time : {{ $now }}

parameters.content:
### Telegram Trigger & AI Agent Flow

- **Telegram Trigger** ‚Üí Listens for new messages from the user on Telegram.  
- **AI Agent** ‚Üí Processes the user‚Äôs message, understands intent (e.g., booking, feedback, etc.), and replies in a conversational way.  
- **Memory & Parsers** ‚Üí Help the AI remember context and structure the responses so the flow remains smooth.

### Switch, Telegram & Edit Fields

- **Switch Node** ‚Üí Decides the flow based on user input.  
  - If the user is making a **Booking**, the process continues toward reservation steps.  
  - If the user is giving **Feedback**, it routes the conversation separately.  

- **Telegram Nodes** ‚Üí Send appropriate responses back to the user on Telegram depending on the chosen path.  

- **Edit Fields** ‚Üí Prepares and formats the booking details (guest count, preferences, date/time, etc.) before passing them to the next step in the workflow.

### Booking Agent, Google Calendar, Gmail & Telegram

- **Booking Agent** ‚Üí Collects all finalized booking details from the user, organizes them, and prepares a structured summary. It also creates a formatted HTML template for the confirmation email and ensures the booking payload is properly structured.  

- **Google Calendar** ‚Üí Automatically creates a reservation event with the provided details (guest count, preferences, date/time, special requests).  

- **Send a Message (Gmail)** ‚Üí Sends a professional confirmation email to the user with all booking details included.  

- **Telegram (Final Confirmation)** ‚Üí Notifies the user on Telegram that their reservation has been successfully booked, completing the process end-to-end.
